scheduler

Class HospitalDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduler.HospitalDate

  • public class HospitalDate
extends java.lang.Object
    We'll use this class as a date-class as Java's Date classes and alternatives are outdated or complex or would make our code illegible at some points.

        public HospitalDate(int year,
            int month,
            int day,
            int hour,
            int minute,
            int second)
        Creates a new hospitaldate, with the given date objects.
        Parameters:
        year - The year.
        month - The month of the year.
        day - The day of the month.
        hour - The hour of the day.
        minute - The minute of the hour.
        second - The second of the minute.
        Throws:
        InvalidHospitalDateArgument - if the arguments are non sensible
